Please Allow permission for Screen lock

As we can detect you may be using MIUI or Xiaomi device so to toggle wifi MIUI and Xiaomi device gives special request for wifi. 
Please goto other permission and then click Change WI-FI Connectivity and Allow permission. 
Press settings to goto App Settings. 
Press Cancel if already Allowed The permission.
